reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and comfortable, appreciating how it hugs their curves beautifully and fits well. The color receives positive feedback, with one customer noting its vibrant hues. The material quality and length receive mixed reviews - while some praise the fabric, others find it cheap-looking, and several mention the dress runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: This dress is gorgeous! Fits like a glove. I’m 5’4” 145lbs and ordered a small. It is so flattering and elegant. I ended up returning it bc I found a different dress. The only downside is that it is somewhat see thru. Not bad enough to give it a lower star rating. You can wear black body suit under it and no one would know. Don’t hesitate. It’s beautiful and under $20! Read more
items.author: Danielle King

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress! Great price and nice material
items.body: Amazing dress for the price. Statement piece! Nice material with stretch. I’m 5’3 and wore big wedges with it. I also used body tape to secure the top as it was a bit baggy when I leaned forward. I used this for a Halloween party when I was J lo but a bunch of girls wanted to borrow it for a cruise or outdoor wedding. It’s a really nice flattering dress! I got the size small. Im short and curvy but the material and style really accentuates that! Read more
items.author: dstar

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars False Dress Title: It's just a normal 2 arm dress
items.body: This is NOT a off the shoulder dress. It does not look or function like the image implies. There is a gaping hole on either side of the dress when you try to slide either side down. Nor does the shoulder side stay in place. Very uncomfortable. Read more
items.author: Jia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Fit and elegant.
items.body: Beautiful dress! The zipper was threatening to break and could be better quality. But overall it’s a nice dress and I received many compliments. Read more
items.author: Nikki77

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering Fit with Nice Stretch and Thick Material
items.body: Nice, thick material. Irons well. Good stretch. Color is consistent with picture advertised. My height is five, four a half ish, 145-150 pounds and the dress touches the floor without heels. Medium fit very comfortably. Ladies with a bigger bust may have issues with strapless adhesive bras because that top area of the dress doesn’t have a large coverage area on the strapless side. I wore pasties but had to keep checking to make sure that it wasn’t peaking out of the dress. Read more
items.author: jadadoll2008

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful & Flimsy
items.body: I wore this to a wedding and felt stunning. The color is rich and warm—a dark brown with a subtle purple undertone that looked beautiful on my skin. I’m 5’7” and it hit right at the ankle without dragging, which was perfect. The fit is flattering and stretchy, so I was comfy all night and got tons of compliments. The downside is the quality. The zipper is flimsy, and there were loose threads. One seam even split by the end of the night, possibly from the zipper being hard to work. The fabric is very lightweight, so it might not feel dressy enough for some events. It’s a beautiful piece, just not the most durable. Read more
items.author: Shauneil Boyer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: I ordered this to wear for a Jennifer Lopez Halloween costume. The style is sexy yet classy. I’ll be looking for another occasion to wear it! The fabric is soft and comfortable. It may be a bit hot if worn in the summer, but is the perfect weight for other seasons. Colors are vibrant and true to the product photo. True to size with plenty of stretch. The top was a bit large on me, but sits flat so it wasn’t a problem. Read more
items.author: Kate Raposa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect to pair with a scarf
items.body: This dress hugged in all the right ways! I wore it for a speaking event, and my partner and I definitely stood out. I appreciated the price, especially since it looked so good on! I’m plus-size and was worried about the fit. But it’s true to size and has room to breathe. Read more
items.author: Reviewer2

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Evening Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Evening Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Evening Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black/Flower, Brown, Flower, Burgundy, Solid/Red, Solid/Purple, Rose, Beige/Floral, Solid/Dark Blue, Black, Solid/Black, Dark Red, Red, Lilac. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
